plot outline: Raj and Pooja move to a new independent house along with their kids. They are desperately looking for a maid who takes care of their kids. Kavya rescues daughter of Pooja from an accident. Kavya is jobless and she is offered the maid's job in Pooja's and she takes it up. Over a period of time, she gets close to the family members of Pooja. The rest of the story is all about why Kavya joined the house of Pooja.
title: Kavya's Diary
